entry.title: The Hampton
entry.summary:
Vendor: 604wholesale
Type:
Price: 1299.00

THE HAMPTON:

This quaint 2 piece sectional with coffee table can fit into the coziest of spaces.  Essentially no bigger then a sofa, The Hampton allows maximum seating for small spaces as it includes the chaise in the size.  The table comes with a 7mm tempered glass top

The chaise can be ordered on either side and in any of our 15 wicker and 65 cushion options!

Measurements are:

7 ft x 6 ft (chaise)

Table is 2 ft x 2


As with everything we carry it is 100% Handcrafted Durable, lightweight rust-free aluminum frames All weather hand woven resin wicker is UV, stain, crack, water and split resistant for extra durability lasting powder-coat finishes Stylish contemporary design All weather fabric Comfortable, generously proportioned seating Designed to withstand frequent use and harsh elements Very easy to take care of.

Cushions are zippered encased for easy cleaning and come with a 1 year warranty, wicker resin has a 5 year warranty!

 

Weather covers - $299

THE OUTDOOR RUG:

The outdoor rug we have available is EXACTLY as shown (in the dark espresso brown color, with beige accent innerlay).  It measures 10 ft 6 x 7 ft 8 and warms up any outdoor area.  Mold resistant, fade resistant and moisture resistant...this outdoor rug will highlight any outdoor living space

Limit quantities available for the year.

Measurements are:

10 ft 6 x 7 ft 8

entry.title: THE FRANCO
entry.summary:
Vendor: 604wholesale
Type: Sectionals
Price: 1599.00

THE FRANCO:

604wholesale's latest cute sectional is called the Franco. This beautiful trendy modern design is a 2 piece sectional and should fit comfortably in any home or condo. It is made with genuine Italian leather, Canadian birch for the frame and comes with a 2 year warranty.

Can be ordered with the chaise on either side and in 18 leather colors or 65 fabric colors.

It comes accented with chrome legs however, you can switch to a dark wood if you like

Measurements are:
8 ft 4 x 5 ft (chaise) seating depth is 3 ft.

Price in fabric is $1,399

Sectional is actually 3 individual pieces.

entry.title: The Sartori
entry.summary:
Vendor: 604wholesale
Type: Sectionals
Price: 2799.00

THE SARTORI:

Luxury, comfort and affordability are just some of the few words to describe our latest sectional; The Sartori.

The Sartori is made with top grain Genuine Italian leather while the feet are accented in chrome. The sectional comes in 3 pieces that clasp into place securing the gorgeous sectional in any design you decide to construct.

The 2 adjacent headrests are adjustable catering to your desires of comfortability.

Measurements are:
9 ft 4 x 9 ft 4 for length and width
3 ft deep

Price
2,799 in Leather
2,499 in microfiber or fabric

Not only is this sectional a fantastic conversation piece, its sleek and luxurious style highlight any living room or media that its placed in.

Available in 14 different leather colors and 26 microfiber colors.

9 ft 4 inches Long x 5 ft for the chaise.

The Austin fits comfortably in any condo or house. Ideal for maximizing space and a great conversation piece, the Austin is one of our top sellers!

THE MEGAN:

The Megan is an elegant 3 piece sectional that comfortably seats a large amount of people in a short amount of space.

Measuring at 8 ft x 8 ft the Megan can hold at least 5-6 adults while still maintaining a small footprint in your living room. It is absolutely one of the most comfy couches we carry!

Made in genuine Italian leather the Megan can be ordered in over 18 leather colors or 40 fabric options.

8 ft x 8 ft sectional 3 feet deep

THE MCKENZIE:

This luxurious sectional is absolutely amazing. Measuring at 10 ft 10 inches long and 8ft for the chaise, the middle portion on the 10ft side can actually be removed to serve as an individual chair creating a more cozy conversation piece thus reducing the total size to 8 ft 6 x 8ft.

Fits perfectly in any house or condo. Made with Genuine Italian Leather.

With stunning ADJUSTABLE HEADRESTS, tufted stitching on the seat cushions and the ability to have additional seating on the chaise makes this one of the most sought after sectionals we carry!

THE DOMO:

The DOMO is a brand new 3 piece sectional that just debuted at the 2019 home expo. The DOMO has a beautiful European design with modern accents and is as comfortable as it is stylish.

Available in top grain or aniline leather and in over 64 different fabrics (microsuede or polyester) this will be one of 604wholesale's most popular sectionals we carry!

entry.title: THE VANCITY
entry.summary:
Vendor: 604wholesale
Type: Sectionals
Price: 3599.00

THE VANCITY:

The Vancity infuses and sleek style with comfortablility unmatched against any other sectional not to mention it seats 10 people!

The back cushions are completely removable as are the 3 headrests which come with the sectional. The ottoman can be attached to the end of the sectional which can seat a total of 10 people!

The cushions are encased with a zipper for easy cleaning.

The Vancity can be ordered in any color in leather or microfiber. As well, the sectional can be made the opposite way.

Measurements are:
15 ft in Length from corner to end which includes the ottoman. 12 ft without the ottoman.
26 inches of seating space
